question: What is the estimated food grain production during the 2020-21 kharif season?
explanation:
The production of food grains in India during the 2020-21 kharif season has been estimated at 144.52 million tonnes.
This record high estimate is made despite COVID 19 crisis prevailing in the country. As per official release, the production of food grains during the 2019-20 kharif season stood at 143.38 million tonnes.
